#summary Documentation of the data-submission format to Indicia

= Introduction =

The following example uses JSON notation. At some point perhaps I should turn this into an XML schema?

= Details =

An example submission to the Indicia web services will look as follows. Items prefixed with an underscore should be replaced with the implied value.

{{{

{ "submission" :
	{ "entries" : [
		{ "model" :
			{
				"id" : "_Model Name",
				"fields" : 
				{
					"_field id" :
					{ "value" : "_field value" },
					"_field id 2" :
					{ "value" : "_field value 2"}
				},
				"fkFields" :
				{
					"_field id (fk_modelname)" :
					{
						"fkTable" : "_name of model this is a fk to",
						"fkSearchField" : "_field to search in",
						"fkSearchValue" : "_value to search for",
						"fkIdField" : "_field to return value from"
					}
					
				},
				"subModels" : [
				{ 
					"fkId" : "_foreign key field to insert submodel id",
					"model" :
					{
						"id" : "_Model Name",
						"fields" : 
							....
					}
					....
				}],
				"metaFields" : 
				{
					"_field id" :
					{ "value" : "_value" },
					"_field id 2" :
					{ "value" : "_value 2" }
				}
			}
		},
		{ "model" : 
			....
		}]
	}
}

}}}
